source: TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SEQ_00<tab>Torrid Whisper at Copperbell Mines has lost his mining tools.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SEQ_00<tab>カッパーベル銅山のトリッド・ウィスパーは採掘道具がなくて困っている。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SEQ_01<tab>In the chaos of escaping from the mines, Torrid Whisper left behind his sharpened pickaxe, old hammer, and heavy sledgehammer. Find the three tools and return them to their distraught owner.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SEQ_01<tab>トリッド・ウィスパーは坑道から逃げるときに採掘道具を置いてきてしまった。彼の代わりに拾ってこよう。道具は「鋭いピック」「古いハンマー」「重いモール」の3つがある。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SEQ_02<tab>You have gathered all three of the mining tools. Deliver them to Torrid Whisper at Copperbell Mines.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SEQ_02<tab>採掘道具を全て拾った。「カッパーベル銅山」の「トリッド・ウィスパー」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SEQ_03<tab>Reunited with his beloved tools, Torrid Whisper resolves to search for work elsewhere in Eorzea.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SEQ_03<tab>道具を渡した。無事、トリッド・ウィスパーは他の場所で仕事を再開できそうだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_TODO_03<tab>Return the mining tools to Torrid Whisper.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_TODO_03<tab>トリッド・ウィスパーに採掘道具を渡す

source: TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SOLIDTRUNK_000<tab>Adventurer, please! A moment, if you would. Do you mean to go into the mines?
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SOLIDTRUNK_000おお、あんた冒険者だろ？
ちょっと頼まれてくれ！

source: TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SOLIDTRUNK_001<tab>I fled for my life when the coblyns came, and only now realized that I left my tools behind.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SOLIDTRUNK_001坑道で魔物が出たってんで大急ぎで逃げて来たんだが、
やれやれ、と思って手元見たら採掘道具が1個もねえ！
慌てたせいで全部置いてきちまったんだな。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SOLIDTRUNK_002<tab>Please, you must retrieve them for me─my sharpened pickaxe, old hammer, and heavy sledgehammer. Without them, my life is as good as over!
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SOLIDTRUNK_002頼む、俺の代わりに採掘道具を取ってきてくれ。
道具は「鋭いピック」「古いハンマー」「重いモール」の3つだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SOLIDTRUNK_010<tab>Please find my sharpened pickaxe, old hammer, and heavy sledgehammer. They mean more to me than life itself!
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SOLIDTRUNK_010道具は「鋭いピック」「古いハンマー」「重いモール」だ。
どれも駆け出しの頃から使ってきた、愛用の道具なんだぜ！

source: TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SOLIDTRUNK_011<tab>Gods bless you, you found them! Oh, my beauties... I thought I'd lost you forever.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SOLIDTRUNK_011おお！　これだこれだ！
よかった、全部無事だったんだな。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SOLIDTRUNK_012<tab>Mining's all I've ever done. It's all I know. With Copperbell what it is now, it's time to move on elsewhere, but without my tools... I just couldn't.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SOLIDTRUNK_012別の鉱山で、また採掘仕事を探そうにも
道具がなけりゃ何もできねえからな。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SOLIDTRUNK_013<tab>I can't thank you enough, friend. You've done more for me than you could ever know.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL096_00504_SOLIDTRUNK_013<tab>おかげで食いっぱぐれずにすんだよ、ありがとな！
